comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Are you joking here? Everyone should know that 1xbet and 1xbit are the same fucking site or owned and operated by the same people. Nice try here bud but everyone should avoid this like it's the plague. DO NOT CONTACT THIS GUY FOR SHIT!!!!

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Aside from what yahoo mentioned, The account is fully verified which means the user who submit the KYC can easily recover this account by just contacting the support and providing the same KYC documents to verify again the account prove the ownership. Selling a verified account even with trusted casino is prohibited and risky at the same time since it can be recovered by the real owner anytime by just claiming that it was hacked.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: This doesn't even fit in here, this should be on Digital Goods board (I'll help you with that to be moved by the mods). Unluckily, you'll never find a legit buyer here since the reputation of the casino profile you're selling hit rock bottom, you'll just captivate scammers trying to contact you (hoping you're not having the same vibes here if you're ever contacted).
